main event: A commercial airline pilot spotted an object flying towards Albuquerque, New Mexico from the southwest corner of the state.
interesting points: The object had a slight light on the rear and was estimated to be at 25,000 feet, moving at a very fast speed.
The report was received as a CIRVIS (Communications Instructions for Reporting Vital Intelligence Sightings) report.
The altitude, heading, and flight path of the object were estimated to be consistent with a jet aircraft.
The headquarters concluded that the observer likely saw a jet aircraft and the exhaust from the aircraft.
sighted object: One fast-moving object with a slight light on the rear
photographs: No photographs were included in the report.
